dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 1304 IH: To repeal the Authorization for Use of Military Force Against Iraq Resolution of 2002.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Lee (for herself, Mr. Jones, and Mr. Honda) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs

form.official-title: To repeal the Authorization for Use of Military Force Against Iraq Resolution of 2002.

section.header: Repeal of Authorization for Use of Military Force Against Iraq Resolution of 2002
section.text: The Authorization for Use of Military Force Against Iraq Resolution of 2002 (Public Law 107â€“243; 50 U.S.C. 1541 note) is hereby repealed.
